Reviews.Title: Have a  close look before buying.
Reviews.Author: Desta
Reviews.Content: I love the brand, but the seller was not honest. I was told it was locked, but it was not. It also freezes sometime. I assume when they refurbished it, it was not done well. The LG 2x phones are great, but be careful from whom you buy it. I would not recommend refurbished LG 2x. LG 2x phone are the best.
